DOC.brief_summary: Our goal study decrease severity Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder symptom sexually abused child age 8-12 . We also aim improve child 's quality life , decrease level anxiety depression well improve level attachment .
DOC.brief_title: A 1-year Program Treat Children Who Have Been Victims Child Sexual Abuse
DOC.criteria: History sexual abuse Aged 8 12 year Developmentally able onsite `` camplike '' treatment facility 3 week parent/guardian ( without family available join child Be Brave Ranch ) Able perform skill daily live self care Good physical health Severe mental health issue include ( limited ) : Recent suicide attempt History psychosis History significant selfharm History homicidal thought action History violent behaviour sufficient consider threat others Acute eat disorder . Significant risk absconding , history abscond Serious behavioural problem Significant use drug alcohol History sexual violence sexual behaviour towards others Any significant interaction justice system police Cognitive impairment would interfere treatment benefit Medical condition stable Severe medical condition
